name: FOOTSIES
description:
With fighting game trying to appeal to a wider audience by simplifying mechanics while keeping it competetive, this is a more casual game focusing on timing and judging reach with (currently) only heavy and light kicks.

I hope to be able to use this to get more people interested in the fighting game genre as a whole or just to play this as a casual party game. As such, the game is 2 player local-multiplayer with no current single player mode.

All feedback is very much appreciated!

Support for Gamepad is avaliable (this has currently been tested with the Duelshock 4).

This is currently the MVP and many aspects (including the name) may differ drastically from later versions.
